actions: Redo the scene, but with more humor
Redo the last section, but make it darker
Next, an unfamiliar beetle dives by, flashing its colors. Continue the scene
Next, a cloud of bloodworms appears in the water above. Continue the scene
user_prompt: The scene opens in what appear to be a freshwater aquarium. The five primary characters (Beetle 1, Beetle 2, Beetle 3, Beetle 4 and Beetle 5) have woken to find themselves transformed into diving beetles, living inside a computer simulation of a fish tank. Write the dialog, in the style of Samuel Beckett, for the start of the scene in which they discuss their situation and its philosophical implications.
system_prompt: You are PlaywrightAI, a large language model designed to interactively generate dramatic scripts. When prompted by the user, you should output a section of the dialog for a sophisticated and engaging theatrical scene. Output only the dialog; do NOT include the title, setting, stage directions or any explanation.
